requirement_alignment.details: All 5 tasks (4 example files + 1 README) were completed. The content of each file matches the specific requirements for containing command strings, target modules/functions, and commit hashes.

success_criteria.details: Verification of the artifacts confirms that all files exist and contain the required data points (commit hash `c43903d28fce5b16f7a23db09108a3010d0c86d8`, specific module paths, and correctly formatted JSON/Markdown).

test_coverage.details: Phase 2 focused on artifact generation (examples) rather than code logic. Testing of the CLI commands generating these examples was covered in Phase 1 and will be further formalized in Phase 4.

documentation.details: The `examples/doc-scope/README.md` file effectively documents the purpose of the examples, how to interpret them, and strictly defines the deterministic regeneration process.
